tool_description: An API to convert natural language text into numbers. Takes in a number and returns
name: word2number
title: word2number

api_list.name: Text to Text with Numbers
api_list.description:
This endpoint receives text with numbers in the text and returns the same text with all the numbers replaces by their numeric representation.
For example the text "My address is two hundred and fifty two Caplan's street. Floor fifteen apartment twelve"  
The API's response would be "My address is 252 Caplan's street. Floor 15 apartment 12"

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: My address is two hundred and fifty two Caplan's street. Floor fifteen apartment twelve

api_list.name: Word to Number
api_list.description:
This endpoint lets you convert a phrase describing a number into a number.
For example "twenty thousand two hundred and twelve" would return 20212.

required_parameters.name: phrase
required_parameters.default: twenty thousand two hundred and twelve
